website_summaries.verdict: A spacious tent with a fun castle style.
pros: Very tall and works indoors or outdoors
At 54 inches tall, this is a big tent that kids will be able to stand up in
Despite its lightness, it is sturdy and packs away easily
The glow in the dark stars are a nice touch

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable tent! I gifted this for a 4th birthday and she is OBSESSED! Her parents say she’s uses it daily and dresses up as a princess to play in it. Every little girls dream house :)
customer_reviews.author: AMCase

customer_reviews.title: Fiberglass rods shatter and will invisibly injure your children
customer_reviews.text: I must reference these reviews in my own:   The issue is that this product is dangerous and should be removed from the store. My children ended up with fiberglass splinters due to this flimsy product collapsing under their tiny weight, and they had no way to clearly communicate why they were in pain. It's garbage. The rods that support the tent are fiberglass without proper sheathing. They simply snap with a tiny amount of pressure and the fibers are released to wreak havoc. This item should be recalled. Every customer should be refunded. It is trash that will hurt your children.
customer_reviews.author: thereviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. This is a perfect fit. It is large enough for my 3 year old granddaughter and several dolls to play comfortably. I even fit in it with her and we still had enough room for a few dolls to have tea with us, although it was of course, a bit tight. It doesn't take up too much space in my house (like I would complain about ANYTHING of hers taking up space haha). Set up was easy. The instructions aren't good, so I got it up by trial and error. Still, I had it assembled in under 5 minutes. Absolutely adorable and she loves it. Best $20 I've ever spent on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Best birthday party gift
customer_reviews.text: We got it as a gift and my kids loved is so much so we got the Princess Castel for our best friends birthday party . No surprise it was the best gift. The play house is well made and very easy to assemble. Takes less than 5 min. There is plenty of space for pretend play and toys and few friends. You can fold it up nicely in a small bag.
customer_reviews.author: Christna

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great!!!! My kids love playing with the castle.
customer_reviews.author: Evelio Gil

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, excellent durability.
customer_reviews.text: This is super adorable! Usually I have horrible experiences with products like this but the Princess Castle Plat Tent surprised me! It is durably and thoughtfully built. There is a "door" that can be closed via velcro strips or tied up to be kept open. There are even little windows for your princess to peek out of! After they are done playing just put it back in the convenient storage bag! This is an unbelievable purchase for the price. I would recommend for anyone who has a special princess in their life who needs her own little play space. She will love it and you will love the smiles!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah McDill

customer_reviews.title: Endless hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for my kids to play in and to use their imagination. My toddler saw the tent and was so excited about it. Since this tent came he's been playing in it everyday with his toys and and books. This tent is great quality and stands up really well to being played by both boys and girls. It feels great quality and looks like it will stand up to good wear and tear and will last a long time. It comes in a case which make it great for easy storage and its easy to build and take a part. Overall it's a great product with endless hours of fun and play.
customer_reviews.author: Ohbaby

customer_reviews.title: Easily broke fiberglass poles
customer_reviews.text: The first day of use one of the poles broke. It would not have been an issue, if they were plastic or something... nope, they are FIBERGLASS. So I just spent a good bit of time, picking tiny pieces of fiber glass out of my toddler's hand. Needless to say, the tent was immediately removed and disassembled. Now I get to explain to my daughter, why she can't have her birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Missing part - could not use - birthday gift...check your package first
customer_reviews.text: I am so embarrassed. We brought this for a birthday party for a 3 year old. We did not open it beforehand. One of the metal connectors on a pole was completely missing. So, the pole couldn't hold together and hold that part of the tent up. The poor three year old was so excited and didn't want us to take it back from her. They are going to duck tape it for her. If you are giving this as a gift, you might check beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: Whoo?

customer_reviews.title: very flimsy and does not glow in the dark like the description says
customer_reviews.text: why is anybody not complaining about the wrong description on this item. IT DOES NOT GLOW IN THE DARK. my kid is sooooooo disappointed. they want you to buy glow in the dark sticks which is what it says on the packaging. i guess that's what they meant when the description says glow in the dark. they made the stars white and see through so you can use glow in the dark sticks inside while the kid is in it. very bad misrepresentation of a product.
customer_reviews.author: EMMA LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not "Extremely durable" as advertised...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this castle didn't last more than a week for us. We did use it outside, but on the first day, with barely any use, I could already see the support structures pushing through the material at the bottom. It is now completely broken, after about 2 weeks. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Scored!
customer_reviews.text: We scored with this great deal of a adorably, priced tent. My 3 y/o Gbaby renamed it her " Castle." It not a tent to her and she refused to call it a tent haha. She walks in and out of it fine. We placed her small mini folding couch/bed in it, so she lays in it. Easy to store and fast to put together. What I liked about it is that it was designed to travel with it or store it easily away when it is not in use, but of course this " Castle" is now a part of my living room decoration. Ty ! E ( Best Gma Status)
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: waist your money n get metal splinters In your band from the assembly poles
customer_reviews.text: Ok this was cute for like 3 seconds and got bad tiny slivers pieces of metal in my hand trying to fold to put away. The poles really hurt and I still have metal slivers in my hand that I can see and feel. It isn’t worth the pain and slants to the side. Very cheap and very disappointing gift for my daughters 4th bday. Massively regret buying this. Too afraid to put it back together because it hurts too much! :(
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Braun

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Thus is the second one I have purchased here. I originally bought it when my grand-daughter was 2 years old. She is 4 years old now and due to the wear and tear she provided on the first one I bought a second one. It is very well made and durable, but after two years of constant play she has been a little rough. This is one of her favorite play things! She plays in it constantly and even uses it as her "alone" place when she's angry of tired. I can't recommend it enough. For the price and quality you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: So far so good she feels safe in the enclosed environment
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my German Shepherd who is terrified of thunder storms. I thought it would serve as a den for her to hide in. So far so good she feels safe in the enclosed environment, her own little den. The tent is easy to put up and take down, for when there are no storms, and stores easily as it is very compact and fits in its storage bag easily.
customer_reviews.author: JackieMac

customer_reviews.title: Beware !
customer_reviews.text: Brought this as a birthday gift for my three year old granddaughter. She was very excited to put it up and play in it . I told her that when it got dark the stars would glow. My daughter called me the other day and I asked her how my granddaughter enjoyed the tent with the glowing stars. She told me that the stars do not glow and my granddaughter was very disappointed. The reason why I picked this tent was for the fact that it stated that the stars glowed. Not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mc Dermott

customer_reviews.title: Makes a GREAT sand castle!!
customer_reviews.text: I added a plastic pool and play sand to make a "sand castle" for my 2 y.o. granddaughter. She loves it! The pool and tent work great to contain the sand and protects my granddaughter from the weather and "little critters". The flap is closed when not in use to protect the sand from unwanted "visitors". My granddaughter is able to play inside where she can see whoever is outside with her or, she can sit where she is "hiding" from us! I would recommend this product for others. (I'm sure this would work as intended/described by the manufacturer as well).
customer_reviews.author: Patricia King

customer_reviews.title: My niece LOVES THIS
customer_reviews.text: My niece has moved into this tent. She absolutely LOVES IT. She is in the second grade...I think she is 6 or 7...in case you are wondering about the age. Her mother tells me this was instant fun...and its her new place to sleep. A simple little tent has brought her hours of fun and enjoyment. I highly recommend this. This is my opinion. I was not solicited to write this review, nor am I receiving any perks for writing it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: what a nightmare, My daughter and I were both hurt by fiberglass splinters. I spent hours trying to remove splinters they are invisible to the eye so you must feel your way around. My daughter is 2 and she was unable to tell me where hers were but she would cry periodically and randomly as I am writing this review I still haven't found all of them and I keep finding some on me. had to remove the entire castle with all the teddy bears inside until I can make sure they are clean.
customer_reviews.author: martin168th

customer_reviews.title: Holes and Splinters
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and my daughter loved it at first but right away the poles tore holes in the bottom. It's not sturdy at all. I just noticed it was sitting funny and went inside to see one of the poles had broken where it connects with another pole and tiny white splinters were everywhere! They got in my hands and was pretty painful. I ended up having to throw the whole thing away. Just glad I noticed before my kids got hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed!! She is one and it fits her perfectly. She loves bringing her blankets and books into it with her! She thinks it’s pretty neat when I go in with her too! Very easy to put up. But takes a bit of time... it’s absolutely not worth taking down... its like setting up a camping tent with the poles... only you have to tie them to the sides. So that’s the only downfall.. it takes up a good amount of space. So it does suck that you can’t take it down easily. But I don’t know how you would ever make it possible 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Tycz

customer_reviews.title: For the quality should be a bit cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are basic but find them first. I had to stitch two of the ties that secure the poles back onto the tent ... They came off the moment I tied them. The poles should be on the outside...for an adult.to get inside here and set the poles up is really tough..it's built for a 2-4 yr old, not a 37 year old! Also the ties that hold the poles should be Velcro like a camping tent. Not impressed but my daughter likes it so we're keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Let down.
customer_reviews.text: It was extremely hard to put together. The blue space one from y’all was easy. We’ve had the pink one up for a few hours and already one of the ties inside broke off. And all of the rods seem extremely tight. Like they weren’t made for the measures of the tent. My twin daughter is heartbroken. The whole point of me buying two individual tents, was so they could both separately Enjoy something so neat. I had such high hopes for the tents.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Purchased based on great reviews from others
customer_reviews.text: Purchased based on great reviews from others. Installation is a bit of a pain, due to having to tie each stake from the inside. Velcro would have been so much easier, but they are held together by having to TIE each one. after 3x usage, the bottom part of the tent where the stakes are held by nylon webbing began to rip. After 4x usage, every corner that held the stakes ripped. Could not return because I was over the return time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lee

customer_reviews.title: Ok but missing tie
customer_reviews.text: missing tie on the inside for one of the tent poles. Will be sending back. And stars don't glow
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but too hard for a kid to construct
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is delighted with her "castle" tent and upon opening it up on Christmas morning immediately wanted to put it up. Unfortunately, it was beyond the skills of a 6 year old. I was anticipating one of those things that collapsed in upon itself and would just pop up and down. This tent has tent pegs that have to be assembled then worked into pockets INSIDE the tent and then Velcro'd in place. I had to put the tent over my head and perform gymnastics to get it together. (I'm sure my 63 years made it more difficult). When it was up however, she LOVED it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tent sucks
customer_reviews.text: Broke in a day/ wrote a bad review company offered to make things right, take off review and they would send me a gift card as refund. I took off review and they never send refund. This tent SUCKS and the seller is shady. Don’t buy this product. I literally got a plastic splinter from building it with it’s crappy and cheaply made pieces. Children play in this tent, it’s made horribly, one of my kids could have easily been cut from the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: ally2

customer_reviews.title: she likes it
customer_reviews.text: It gets very warm inside very quickly with the door closed. The material doesn't breathe at all. Picture one of those cheap collapsible laundry hampers in tent form. One of the corners is already ripped at the seam from assembly. It is plenty big for her to lay in with her stuffed animals though. They included a 5 dollar cash rebate thing in the box, but for some reason after I filled out their survey and answered all of their questions they decided there's no code available for me at this time. How annoying I wasted my time on that. Anyway, my 4 year old likes it. It is her very own little tent and she was excited about it.
customer_reviews.author: ksh

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy, needs a few improvements
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, it's simple to put up/down once you read the instructions. My daughter got this for her 4th birthday and loves it. The negatives: The mesh in the windows is thin and too easily torn. It hasn't even been a month and one window has a huge tear we had to sew back together. A sturdier mesh would make the tent VERY durable. And the second thing is the fiddly little ribbons that keep the supports from sliding around. Replace with Velcro so I'm not tying five tiny ribbons into bows every time I have to put it up. Fix those two things and it's a definite 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but flimsy and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The product lasted all the way up til now when I purchased it back in August . The poles have broken and my child has only entered the tent only a few times. I’m very disappointed with the product especially after the small time span in which I had it in my possession.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, and adorable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the princess castle play tent for Christmas for my (taller than average) 6 year old sister. It arrived on time, and in perfect condition (packaged well). The tent is very easy to put up and take down (flexible poles that are inserted into pockets). She was absolutely thrilled about it, and promptly filled it with blankets and her favorite stuffed friends :) It seems like it will last a while, too. Though very crowded, it has fit 2 very hyper kids at a time without ripping. I would definitely recommend this tent. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Dactyl

customer_reviews.title: Stars do NOT glow in the dark
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old daughter would live in it if we let her. Easy to set up. We have it on the corner of her bedroom so we haven't taken it down since we put it in her room. The material is a little thin so I can see where other reviews say the tent rips where the "support" rods are inserted if you have to constantly take down/put up the tent. If you have a permanent place to put this for your kid(s) then it's a great inexpensive play-tent perfect for anyone 3ft and under. 1 star deduction for flimsy material and 1 star deduction for the stars, they do NOT glow in the dark
customer_reviews.author: T. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: My Grandbabies Castle
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my little 2 year old granddaughter. When she saw it with her brand new stuffed llama sitting in it waiting for her her face just lit up. We put her a blanklet and pillow in it and she carried all of her other stuffed toys in there and had a time all day long. We loved the fact that an adult sized person could even get in there with her and sit up without hitting the top and still had room and she loved it when one of us was in there with her. This was most definitely money well spent. She will enjoy this for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Stenski

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for multiple children!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter (and my toddler son) love this tent! The tent was easy to assemble. It basically pops open and then you insert a few poles in, just like assembling a camping tent. It also folds back easily and takes up very little room. Once assembled, the tent feels very sturdy! The materials feel durable. The screened windows provide good ventilation so it doesn't get too hot. I love how large the tent is - both of my kids can play in there with room to spare. No more fighting over who gets to be inside the tent! The tent is also just plain adorable! This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bokhyun Yoo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality and very expensive quality wise. Regret purchasing it.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap product and very pricey for the quality. Do not buy this plz. It broke within a month.
customer_reviews.author: NEO

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little play house for your little girl
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for m friend's daughter as a Christmas gift and she loved it so much, my friend had to set it up and her daughter slept in it !. I think I can honestly say it was a great purchase and perfect gift for a little girl. I plan on ordering one in the near future for my "little princess". Also, love the fact that the stars on top of the tent glow in the dark. Too cute !!
customer_reviews.author: Hannahk7170

customer_reviews.title: Adorable tent very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is adorable!!! It is the perfect size!!! We have been looking for a tent that wasn't huge but wasn't to small. This is THE tent!! It's very well made and very sturdy when put together!!! My kids played with it for hours!!! I love that the stars glow in the dark on it. It fits 2 toddlers in it perfectly with much more room!! At one point my husband was in it with both of them. Kinda snug but they fit! This is absolutely adorable and a great purchase!! I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: ashley saunders

customer_reviews.title: I was a wonderful idea, but the quality just didn't match up ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a wonderful idea, but the quality just didn't match up to what I was expecting. We purchased for our daughter for Christmas. We assembled the tent Christmas Eve and by Christmas morning one of the poles had poked thru and made a hole. When I tried to pull the pole out of the hole, the pole snapped, ripped the tent and then the pole itself broke. So, the tent is in the trash! :( Waste of money for us.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Terrible instructions for assembly and door doesn't close fully
customer_reviews.text: Saying this assembles in seconds is a joke. The instructions were a nightmare to understand so I went to the video link they said to use on the instructions. The video doesn't exist. That immediately gives major strikes against the product and company in my book. I also wish that it was made evident that the door was just held open by two tiny dots of velcro. I never would've bought it if I had known that. Going out to the store to buy more strips of velcro to fix the product so the door actually closes.
customer_reviews.author: Eliyahu E.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped out of the package.
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for our daughter. She just opened it yesterday (even though we had bought it a month ago) and we tried to put it together. One of the sides is torn already and we couldn’t tie the pole to the side so it is useless. It is past the return window so now we are stuck with a $30 tent that can’t be used.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Mandoff

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: Product is very fragile and the fabric that holds the sticks to support the structure tears apart causing the sticks to come out and the whole thing becames crooked and unstable. I didn't expect allot frok those materials but they definitely can make it more sturdy. Also set up and taking it a part is not 1-2-3. So I rather keep it set up in my living room than take it to the park. Too much hustle.
customer_reviews.author: elena m

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: This cute princess tent is a little girls dream! There's even space for more than one person. It's pink, glows in the dark and pops up and puts together in just a couple of minutes. As little ones use this pop up tent, their little imaginations can run wild. Play time will be much more appreciated when you see the smile and laughter of your little one. This pop up tent is affordable, durable and easy to assemble. Definitely recommend for all those little princess out there!
customer_reviews.author: Tracyjm30

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The tent itself is adorable! It’s roomy for the kids to lay in and read books. I wanted to love this tent but one of the poles busted and it created fiberglass shards. I have some stuck in my thumb and am glad it was me and not the kids who got shards in their fingers. Get a tent with metal poles instead of this one
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Great value great size!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is much larger than you would think. Super easy to set up. My daughter adores it and even her older brother can fit in it! I can snuggle into the opening and share stories with her and tea time. The stars are cute in the dark and set up was a breeze. My 14 year old did it himself and took around 5 minutes. This tent holds up to play and being jostled around by my princess while she fights dragons and when she is having her parties with her "princess puppy". Great buy for that little princess in your life!
customer_reviews.author: KJWinkler

customer_reviews.title: A hit with big and small kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 3 year old daughter for Christmas. She and her 9 year old cousin set it up and played in it all day. It was so easy to set up and take down we carried it around with us for days while visiting family before seting it up in our living room at home. My daughter loves it. It's roomier than I thought it would be. It seems sturdy enough, though a few of the poles seem slightly bent. My mother and sister both want one for the kids after seeing how much they all loved ours. The only drawback to it is that you have to climb inside to setup/ take down.
customer_reviews.author: RMONROY

customer_reviews.title: Get it for your princesses!
customer_reviews.text: I have this set up in my living room it doesn’t take much space and my toddler loves playing in it! My 6’1 hubby can fit inside the castle and my daughter is always ready to play with daddy. She pulled on the rods a few times but it’s holding up and it’s easy to put back together. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Channell

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: My grandchild loved the house. It is pretty big for a 5 year old. She sleeps there. and plays all day in itI had a little bit of problems assembling the house..i had to in to get inside the house to assembly it. soo..it was not fun..hahaha.. the sticks that come with it are not to strong...so if you are not carefull they can brake.... but it is a nice tent for a child...i guess is good for a child up to max 7 years old...not for bigger kids..for toddles is just awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: tania h pamanes

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy eith purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 yr old Granddaughter, she loved it !! It made me so happy to see her so happy. When I bought it for this price I expected a so so tent you know the saying "you get what you pay for" well I got a lot more than the $21.00 I spent. It's alot bigger than I expected, I'm very happy with my purchase, I just ordered two more, I don't have anyone to gift them to right now but they are going to make a great gift for two other little girls.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Girl

customer_reviews.title: I don't have kids...
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely hesitant to buy this. Do kids really like this? My little niece just turned 3 years old and I shopped and shopped until I found this. I of course read all the reviews and it helped me make a decision. Turns out the reviews were right! My little niece loved it so much that she would eat, sleep, and play there for days. Made me feel so happy! You know, that gratifying feeling of having accomplished a great gift! Do it, buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: AP3

customer_reviews.title: Great play house tent!
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought this for my daughter and she loves it, even our dogs love to sleep in it 😂. It’s quite big but it’s super easy to set up and take down, has tent poles so it’s very sturdy. I love how I can stick it back in the carry bag and slip it under the bed for when she’s not playing with it! Although it’s been up for a while now since she enjoys being in it! Great price for an adorable little play house for kids!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany patterson

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and put away, very space efficient. I have two toddlers and they can both play in here together happily. The windows on the side are a nice feature, our last tent didn't have any and got really hot. Plus you can spy on your children easier. BUT... it's tearing around the door already. One of the velcro tabs already came off. We've only played with it twice. And the stars do not glow in the dark on ours which is disappointing. For the price it's a nice little tent, but if your kids are hard on their toys at all you may want to go for something higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barb B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old who is home all the time due to covid really loves this. She can sit up legs crossed in it and do her homework or play her Nintendo Switch. She and our two cats are spending lots of time in it. It is also very pretty. We actually had this exact product from when she was 3 but after years of using it became damaged. Shortly after schools closed we ordered it again and she is just as happy with it. We are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Williams

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Don’t buy this. All of the tent poles have snapped in less then a month of having it ( that’s not playing with it every day either) I had a Thomas the train pop up tent that was played with HARD daily and eventually fabric wore out but the frame was intact. These tent poles are fragile and break right under or above the metal sleeve. Super disappointed in the materials they chose to use in this.
customer_reviews.author: CBenn

customer_reviews.title: obsessed
customer_reviews.text: best $<20 buy ever! Got it for doggie to play in and she just loves it. Super easy to pop up, mostly still intact and she has had it for over a month. Holds up well and it looks like a silly girl castle. It's impossible to put back in the original bag tho - has those weird wire circles that you have to fold in 1/2 and swivel around just perfectly to overlap them. Prob hilarious watching me struggle with it for 5 min before settling on an old pillow case instead. Like those old car windshield sun protectors! We love the castle and would buy another to have in stock when this one dies. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Pal

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: What kid doesn't like their own space. This is a very cute addition to her room. I don't know if the stars glowed; I haven't seen it in the dark. The tent hasn't been taken down since she got it for Christmas so I can't give a definite review of "easy to fold" or not so I rated 4 stars on that portion of the overall rating. I would buy another one if the opportunity presented itself.
customer_reviews.author: Bonyea

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty and Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a pop up tent, and it actually has poles that you set up on the inside like a regular tent so its very sturdy. We used it outside (in November in Oklahoma) and then brought it inside. I was also amazed at how large it is, considering how small it folds up into its carrying case. I thought only the 5 year old would fit, but there was plenty of room for someone else (my 6 year old, 12 year old and 16 year old were all inside at one time as guests of the castle). It is a great addition to any playroom or for visiting little friends!
customer_reviews.author: Superstefmom

customer_reviews.title: Princess Castle play tent
customer_reviews.text: I had a Scooby Doo tent for my grand son and he loved it so now this is for my great granddaughter and I have not given it to her yet, it is a Christmas gift but I am hoping she will enjoy it as much as my grandson did. I used to go inside with him (with some difficult, and read to him, he loved it). It was a good purchase for the price and I would recommend it to my friends with granddaughters.
customer_reviews.author: montrealkid

customer_reviews.title: Good size and easily taken anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This product is so cute! It was so easy to assemble it (once I figured out that the tent poles are placed horizontally in the inside instead of going through flaps or anything), and easy to take it down (it might take a couple of tries to practice folding it, though). My baby sister loves it and takes it all throughout the house and fills it with pillows and toys. It seems that all three of my cats enjoy it also, so that's a plus (it's adorable).
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 11 month old grandaughter and she absolutely loves this tent she spends a lot of time in this tent playing and talking with her dolls in the tent her mom and dad also can go in there with her since its quite large inside.The price and quality are all great for this castle. My daughter said it was very easy to put together and has no worry on her daughter being in the tent by herself because it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: busybee406

customer_reviews.title: Compact, inexpensive, and serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tent today at a discounted priced and received same day. Set up took less than 5 minutes. My 5 year old and 2 year easily fit in there at the same time. They are having a blast personalizing "their" tent. I think I'm going to have to purchase a second one before the fighting begins. Took one star off for the material, but for the price, it's worth it. I'm just worried about the fiberglass poles breaking and having fiberglass shards all in the tent and potential injury. But for first impressions, 4 stars it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mitesh P.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped during first play - Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This tent did not even last 24 hours before it ripped at the seams. The quality is very poor. The stitching holding the tent to the base started to unravel the first day my one-year-old received this as a gift. Within the first several days of having the tent set up, the polls broke through the base as well as the top of the tent. She really loved sitting in the tent and playing, but I cannot even set it up anymore because the polls won’t stay in place. Super disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Shannie C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old daughter loves it, she brought in all her books and dolls in. Do not attempt to set up with excited toddler around... it took longer than it should have. I am 5'5 and was able to fit inside and put the bars up, might be more difficult if you are taller/huskier. It gets pretty hot inside so I would check on the kiddos occasionally. It was bigger than I thought it was going to be, you could probably fit 4 small toddlers in there comfortably. Can't wait to have the cousins over and put it outside during the fall time. Great bargain for $14.99 lighting deal (would not buy at $30-$50)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! When covid 19 hit, and with my 3 yr old home all day, I knew I needed somewhere for her to have her own space for play. It was super easy to assemble by myself, and she has been in it non stop. It's super sturdy, and I love her face seeing the glow in the dark stars (when we take the nightlight out for just a second!) Would definitely recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ACB

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 yr old
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 yr old daughter. She loves it. Her and her 5 yr old brother play in it all the time. It was easy to assemble, but I've found that when they play a little rough in it the poles will come out and it will start to collapse. I wish the top of the poles were more secure as it would prevent them from coming out, but overall it's a very nice tent.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great 3rd birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got a prompt today to write a review. Easy because we love this tent! We actually forgot that it came with the glow in the dark stars and haven't used that yet. Our daughter got the tent for her 3rd birthday and loves it. She watches her kindle in there, plays with the cats in there and sometimes plays hide and seek in there. It fits in our living room and has been a wonderful birthday present. No regrets so far (4 weeks in!!).
customer_reviews.author: Plsletmeremainanonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great little play house!
customer_reviews.text: This is great and my daughter loves it! The only drawback is the set up. Every time you set it up you need to pop in the 4 rods which can be challenging for adults...plus then you need to tie back easy rod which can be more challenging. If you have a place where this can stay set up then I HIGHLY recommend this. If not, I still recommend it just be aware of the extra step on set up!
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Large enough inside to fit me as I climbed in to assemble (the poles go inside and get tied in with little ribbons), and once assembled it's large enough to comfortably fit my 100lb great pyrenees mix. We joked for a long time that Walter was a princess and now he has his very own castle. Hilarious and sweet! Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keirstyn Price

customer_reviews.title: Broke in an hour!
customer_reviews.text: This did not last for one hour. We put the pole up and the string snapped off. It no longer held the tent up. We threw it away. FYI- The poles go inside of the tent and there are little strings to hold the poles to the tent. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lia D

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased - Both of us!
customer_reviews.text: The moment it showed up in the mail and we took it out of the box, my grand daughter's eyes lit up. We got it up and she immediately took ownership. Moved in her little green chair and table, and set up housekeeping. She loves it. The only thing that I am going to add to make it even better is a pad for the floor and battery operated twinkle lights around the roof for her. It is a good quality play tent; easy to put up and take down. I am very glad I purchased this item, and so is my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Barrick

customer_reviews.title: not for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Soon this is so not sturdy for my kids haha. They destroyed this thing. Honestly its great. But they barely touched it. But they are 3 and 2. And the straps that hold the poles snapped off so my daughters were able to pull apart. I dont like how the poles are so visible and open so a younger kiddo will mess with it. My kids also leaned and jumped on it. So it went kaput. Cute idea. Maybe for an older kid who will be more careful with it
customer_reviews.author: NicRiffe97

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We have had other pop up style tents that have fallen apart and bend while the kids sit in them. Although it’s not as quick to disassemble ad the pop up,it is very sturdy and holding up well to my 3 active children( ages 2-5). The poles on the inside are staying together and the tent had no rips or tears . It’s only been a week but we’ve had others that ripped on day one. So far the quality on this tent is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn French

customer_reviews.title: The stars are glow in the dark and the windows are a nice touch! It stands up with four metal rods
customer_reviews.text: I really am wowed by this! My kids are probably among the most creative possible. They're constantly playing house, building tents, and playing with the cheap pop up tent from Walmart (that always falls down and or breaks) this tent is huge inside I sat j side and my youngest walked around me! The stars are glow in the dark and the windows are a nice touch! It stands up with four metal rods. Super easy to put together and tear down. Came with a bag to store! My kids have played with it constantly since we put it up even setting it up as a seperate room.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Not easily assembled
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter standing in front of her castle. She is 4. She loves it and it’s big enough for me and her to fit inside. My finance assembled it. It was pretty tricky for me to figure it out. The second photo is a photo of the sticks use to hold the castle up. The stretch easily and you just put them in place... but putting them on the inside of the castle and making it stand was a bit much for me. But the outcome is pretty cool and I’m sure your little princess would love and enjoy being a princess in her own castle with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lashan

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids, Cats, and Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: There doesn't seem to be any time of day that this tent is empty! It was super easy to put up and just as easy to take down and fold away (although someone always wants it up! I have had children in it ages 5-13 and an 85 pound dog that loves it, as well as two cats that believe it's for them lol. It's roomier that I thought it would be and it certainly takes a beating well! It's an excellent product for the price. My big seven year old can almost stand the whole way up in the center. I definitely recommend this, for kids and their best friends 😉
customer_reviews.author: jbird

customer_reviews.title: Great! Kids love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought fur a 6 year old and she loves it! Big enough to fit her, her brother, and her cousin in it. No issues with the poles snapping and flinging shrapnel all over the room, but I’m also not one to try and force fiberglass rods to do what I want them to do. So I think as long as you don’t hulk out on this thing, all will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Cute little castle
customer_reviews.text: Cute and and the stars glow in the dark (you can kind of see in the picture). Girls love it (3.5 &1.5). Folds up when they aren’t using it and sets up pretty easily with a little work in about 10 minutes. We bought this one to replace one just like it that broke after a year or so of rough and tumble play. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber S

customer_reviews.title: Not a cool product because of the sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for the color and Price. But the product is not that easy to assemble especially you need to sit in side the tent and then use maximum force to fix the rods they have provided. The tent is not sturdy and it falls with my kids when she holds and sit. Also folding is very tough. We had kept her toys inside as weight so that it will not fall down. But my daughter enjoys and plays with it well. That is the reason i give a 3 star for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam J.

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to set up and is the first thing my ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves her "princess castle." She drags my son and I in it with her to play. Its larger than I expected but with two children and an adult it's a little cramped. It was very easy to set up and is the first thing my daughter hasn't managed to destroy. It was a great purchase. I would definitely recommend this product and the seller. Shipping was fast with the prime 2day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mastodon

customer_reviews.title: PRINCESS TENT
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and it was easy enough for her 9 yr old brother to put together for her. She spends most of her time with her tablet, her friends (dolls and bears), her blanket and pillow. It's her little hideaway. And the stars light up although the illumination is minimal it's so cute. My daughter is 4 around 40lbs so its spacious and roomy.
customer_reviews.author: MLewis

customer_reviews.title: Pets like it!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set up, instructions show to have the pink half of the poles on top. Little ties inside to keep them upright. Watch out for the main folded rings to spring open larger than you expect when taking it out of the carrier bag. The door ties don't make perfect sense to me, but work. For a rough estimate on size: when set up you won't be able to easily move it through doors. Remove a pole and then move it. Light enough to move on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: TastyWhale

customer_reviews.title: STARS DO NOT LIGHT UP — TRIED THREE REPLACEMENTS
customer_reviews.text: The stars do not light up. We tried replacing this three times. It is so adorable but no one will contact me either about it. I think they should give it to me for free because there is no way to contact anyone to get an answer why. It is the cutest tent though and I’m sure that’s why no one complained but I was so excited about having it light up and after three tries we just decided to keep it WITHOUT the light up stars.
customer_reviews.author: jgb

customer_reviews.title: Every princess needs this castle!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous tent! She plays with it every day. It was very easy to put together, but we keep it up all the time. Well made, front door flap folds down. Has a window to look through when the door is closed. Easy to clean when you have a tea party inside and spill accidentally. Your uncle can fit inside to read you a book and when your aunt's dress up as Tinkerbell and Elsa for you, then you are all set!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen F

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it at first site. It was easy for my hubby to assemble. My 2 year old roles around in it which Knocks the tent over and it lays on its side with her in it. So I would not consider it sturdy. However my 2 year old loves that she can knock it over on its side while in it. Be sure its located in a safe environment.
customer_reviews.author: N.B

customer_reviews.title: My nieces love it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 5 years old and 1 year old nieces. Omg perfect purchase my niece is really into being a princess, no shoes inside her castle, this is my new home!! She loves it❤ worth every penny. Its bigger than I expected very light weight I wouldn't leave it outside it could easily blow away.
customer_reviews.author: Reeses Pieces

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: This product was a gift for a 4 year old. It was received with excitement and went up with minor difficulties. The ties that hold the support pieces in place started to break within a couple of weeks, then the window part tore, and the downward spiral began. It was given at Christmas and had to be thrown away last week. It didn’t survive 3 full months, and that was with it being well taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Strehle

customer_reviews.title: Ripped in the seem sad toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This went together easy. It was big enough for both our little girls to play inside. Our girls are pretty gentle not to rough on toys and that being said the tent ripped from its frame around the bottom circle under the door. The seam came undone after about 3/4 months of use. Also you need some serious skill to get it back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: S. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Really cute little play tent
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, really nice vibrant colors and is very sturdy and good quality. Set up was easy and quick. My baby girl loves it. Very easy to fold up and put away when not in use. The inside is nice and roomy. 2 little kids could play comfortably but it’s not so large that it takes up the whole room. Perfect for a small space in my opinion. Worth the price. Really pretty colors.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great for imaginary play!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome well made play tent for little girls. I especially like the portability and easy set up. I have taken it to several friend's houses for play dates with and it has been the hit of the time together. The material is quite substantial and has easily taken a beating from being put up and taken down now over 15 times. The size when collapsed fits well into a closet or under the bed for storage. The girls have loved playing with this and have gotten creative to include puppet shows with friends using the windows type openings.
customer_reviews.author: ColdbrookFish

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I got this tent for niece to replace a much more difficult to assemble. Goes up like a normal dome tent and has a ring at the base and near the top to make it stable. The flexible poles make it easy to move around with out having to disassemble. Much better then other tents that cost twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Filthy not new
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in January, for an April birthday.. opened today and it has stains all over it!! Like something yellow exploded on it!!!! I’m really angry😤
customer_reviews.author: Kim Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Ok but could use some add ins
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this tent and the color and hieight. It was easy to assemble. Few things I didn’t like: Some of the roof bars come out time to time, I wish it came with a pad for the floor. Like a padded covered pillow of some sort because this is in my daughter room and some of it is carpeted and some is hardwood and I had to put a blanket on the bottom so it would be comfortable no matter where she sat in it
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. This castle has been a huge hit for our toddler. She loves playing in it and is very proud of her castle. It has plenty of room for a toddler and all of her other princess "stuff" that she has decided to put in it. It was easy and quick to assemble. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Daryle K

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: I don’t typically write reviews but I had to go out of my way to make sure I told other people about how amazing this princess tent has been. I bought it not sure if my daughter would like it. She’s not really into princesses but she loves playing in here and it’s a great size for her. This keeps her busy for hours. It has been a great purchase during the pandemic. High highly recommend!! (Assembly is a little longer than described but worth it!).
customer_reviews.author: Demetruis Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: one pole came bent
customer_reviews.text: One pole came slightly bent and although we were able to put it together it is lopsided. The fabric does not really fit over the poles so it is also causing it to be lop sided. I am surprised at all the good reviews. I would not buy this again...but too much of a pain to return it now...so just dealing with a poorly designed tent.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Made her feel like a princess
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo and her siblings love playing with this tent. She was so excited it had been up for almost a week. It’s really big even my 13yo can fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! lasted maybe a week before it fell over, the stars dont glow in the dark either. Today while cleaning up my daughter's play room I wanted to figure out why it wasnt staying up.... the poles inside are completely busted and now I'm covered in FIBER GLASS! just one of them had broken from my daughter playing in it, I just accidentally broke the other ones trying to set it back up and when they broke a bunch of dust come out and now I inhaled FIBER GLASS! I'm absolutely covered in it. Absolutely pissed right now! This whole time I thought they were metal! (My husband set it up so I wasnt aware they werent)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Thin fabric 😞
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because my daughters LOVE it and it’s already building amazing memories. The bad thing is it’s not gonna last many memories. The poles used to hold it up are made to stay inside the tent and they poke straight into the bottom and are already poking holes through the bottom. I put this up Christmas Day and not even a month later this is what’s happening. It’s unfortunate because it may be my daughters favorite gift but the fabric on bottom should be thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Chloee

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for my granddaughter to receive this gift. She loved it. Then the next day the "supports" for the tent broke leaving jagged edges. Not very sturdy and could have caused serious injury.
customer_reviews.author: Diane O

customer_reviews.title: Senior challenge in erecting tent
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute tent and my young granddaughters love it. However it looked like a pop up tent to me, and when it arrived I discovered someone has to crawl inside to secure rods from the inside. At 73 years of age, I wasn't able to safely accomplish the task. I and my grandchildren had to wait until I could get someone else to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: After careful research, I settled on buying this tent for my daughter. The size is great! It is slightly bigger than I anticipated, but I will take that as a win. My 5'10" husband easily fit inside it to put it together. The glow-in-dark stars is a nice feature, and I love the windows with the door opening. The only complaint was that one of our attachments was slightly flattened making it difficult to connect the rods. We just got some pliers and remedied the issue. Don’t splurge crazy money. Buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: BDZB

product_meta.title: Foxprint Princess Castle Play Tent With Glow In The Dark Stars, Conveniently Folds In To A Carrying Case, Your Kids Will Enjoy This Foldable Pop Up Pink Play Tent/House Toy For Indoor and Outdoor Use
feature_bullets: Enhances creativity and imagination. The best 2 + year old girl or boy toy in the market. It provides comfortable shelter for outdoor trips. It includes sturdy shock-corded fiberglass poles. No assembly or accessories required to fix this Tent. Cleans easily with a damp cloth and soap. Fox toys play tents are a magical adventure for indoors and outdoors activities.
Great for a backyard adventure: your child will have hours of fun with this colorful play tent decorated with hearts and glow-in-the-dark-stars pop it up in the backyard
Encourages motor skill development and open, imaginative play
Quick and easy to assemble, sets up in seconds, just pop it up and insert support rods for additional stability
Enhances creativity and imagination, fox print princess play tent is colorful and kids-friendly designed, it provides comfortable shelter for outdoor trips

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars10,224 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
